import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; const CustomerDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [message, setMessage] = useState("Hello World"); const [customer, setCustomer] = useState(null); const apiUrl = window.location.origin.includes("localhost") ? `http://localhost:5000/customers/${id}` : `https://khamcotailor/customers/${id}`; const authKey = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); useEffect(() => { document.title = `Customer Details - ${ customer ? `${customer.id} -` : "" } Khamco Shop`; const fetchCustomerData = async () => { await axios .get(apiUrl, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${authKey}` }, }) .then((response) => { setCustomer(response.data.customer); }) .catch((error) => { setMessage(error.message); }); }; return () => { fetchCustomerData(); }; }, [apiUrl, authKey, customer]); return ( <>

{customer && (
Edit Create Invoice All Invoices
Add Dependent

 Name

Phone Number {customer.uniqueId} Last Measurement

{new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", })}

Address

{customer.uniqueId}

 Email{" "} {customer.uniqueId} Body Type

{customer.uniqueId}

 Status {customer.uniqueId} Membership {customer.membership_status === "VIP" ? (

{customer.membership_status}{" "}

) : (

{customer.membership_status}

)}

Military Details

ID Number

{customer.uniqueId}

 Rank

{customer.uniqueId}

{customer.uniqueId}

Measurements

Height

{customer.uniqueId} inches

 Other Details

{customer.uniqueId}
Previous Measurements {customer.measurements.length}

Dependents Details

{customer.dependents.length > 0 ? ( customer.dependents.map((dependent) => ( Name

{customer.uniqueId} {customer.uniqueId}

View )) ) : (

This customer has no dependents.

)}
)}
); }; export default CustomerDetails;
